## Solution to Problem 1

```{r}
library(datasets)
data(cars)
head(cars)
cars.supsmu = supsmu(cars$speed, cars$dist, bass = 0, span = "cv")
cars.supsmu
library(ggplot2)
# qplot(x = cars.supsmu$x, y = cars.supsmu$y)
plot(x = cars.supsmu$x, y = cars.supsmu$y, type = "l", col = "red")
lines(x = cars$speed, y = cars$dist, col = "green")
legend(5, 80, legend=c("Original Cars Data", "Super Smoothed Cars Data"))
```
